titleStmt.title: A plaine discouerie of ten English lepers, verie noisome and hurtfull to the Church and common wealth setting before our eies the iniquitie of these latter dayes, and inducing vs to a due consideration of our selues. Published by Thomas Timme minister.
titleStmt.author: Tymme, Thomas, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short, dwelling vpon Bredstreet hill, neere the end of old Fishstreet at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: An attack on schismatics, church robbers, etc.
Running title reads: A discouerie of ten English lepers.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Bredstreet hill, neere the end of old Fishstreet at the signe of the Starre
